headline.main: BULGARIA GETS REPRIEVE; Germany Delays Forcing Her to Enter War Against Russia

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Sept. 28 -- Bulgaria has received a temporary delay on entering the war, pending the outcome of German negotiations with Turkey, according to reports in foreign diplomatic circles.
abstract: Bulgaria gets temporary delay on entering war pending German negotiations with Turkey
snippet: ANKARA, Turkey, Sept. 28 -- Bulgaria has received a temporary delay on entering the war, pending the outcome of German negotiations with Turkey, according to reports in foreign diplomatic circles....

byline.original: Special Broadcast to THE NEW YORK TIMES
